review: I went to Dr Harish for itching issue which i was facing after my viral fever. Dr explained very well about the issue and gave me medicines that gave me relief within a day. I was not able to sleep for two days due to itching and i got rid of that due to Dr Harish treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Took time to understand the problem and explained the issue and medications in detail. The medications he suggested helped me recover within a few days. Really impressed by his friendly nature and way of communicating.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Harish since 1.5 years & I am impressed with his  ability to solve my problems, the way he simplifies & explains the illness/condition, treatment & recovery. Down to earth human being who I always rely on.I was surprised to see the review of Mr. Ashish Singh, co-incidentaly even visited yesterday but I was welcome properly & treated for my issue. Visit any hospital, a doctor who is really good, there are people who wanted get treated only from them & obviously there will be always waiting time. Thank you Dr. Harish I don't mind waiting to see you who will cure my problems.
The doctor was so friendly and so calming and at the same time very thorough with his medical prowess . Just loved the experience .
The doctor was very friendly and provided appropriate treatment as well as medication and suggestions for betterment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly and explain the issues so nicely.  In today world, it's very rare you will get such a nice human being who behaves so nicely with the patient. He suggested few medicines and home remedies that worked well to recover in just 2-3 days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dear Ashish, I am one of the regular visitor to this clinic. All staff and the Doctor are very very friendly. I have never seen any nurse treating the patients there.  They normally follow a regular procedure of checking our BP, Temperature & oxizen saturation levels for their records. This is done to reduce the waiting time for other patients. I think we should check twice before passing our comments.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: we had a confirmed appointment at 5, no one was there when we reached.A very rude nurse told us that Doctor will come by 6, and was ready to provide consultation on her own, she very rudely  asked us to either wait or go. Doctor should be considerate and accept appointment only if they are available.
reply_text:
Thank you for your valuable feedback sir...we understand your pain and will set the things right....

We would like you to consider few points..

1. We got a call from you at 5:07 requesting to confirm location...and we have sent the Google location in 2 min
2. We got a scond call at 5:09...voice was not clear and call got disconnected.(can share the proof through mail if needed as in call record)
3. Our nurse (who was available to receive you in the car...if no one was there then how can she request you to enter in) requested you to come inside to check vitals because you were still in car(not to treat) and informed that doctor will visit in 10 min...(agree doctor must have been by 5 pm...but try to understand...he had to attend emergency during that odd hour and had just gone for lunch. Please check the history and be considerate about his(health care worker's) life also)...proof of your arrival time and our nurse requesting to come in to check vitals is available in cctv cam recordings....
4. Doctor himself called back and our other staff tired to reach back but no response ...this happened after arrival of doc within 10 min of your departure...(can share call record and cctv footage regarding arrival time of doctor)

Request not to be too harsh on us...we are here to help people....Hope you will understand..

Wonderful experience with RJH clinic. Dr. Harish is an excellent doctor, listens to the patient concerns and diagnosis health issues clearly and prescribe the treatment without any unnecessary tests. We are very fortunate to have such a skilled doctor! Thank you so much Doctor.
I would highly recommend Dr.Harish to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: An amazing doctor he has lot of patience will listen to all your issues very patiently and will give us all the necessary information and will also give us workarounds and will not necessarily stick to only medications like most doctors he will suggest us lifestyle changes in order to better deal with the problems we are facing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very friendly and patient. He thoroughly went through all my reports and listened to me calmly. He helped me to understand in medical terms and made me relax by his assurance that I am fit and fine.  More than his medicine, his brief explanation about the disease and the simple solution by him can make anyone perfect.  He gives value and enough time to each patient. Feeling satisfied with Dr's consultation. Regards, S. Ranjan Nayak.
